features.additionalInfo: 24-hour fraud protection that detects abnormal transaction spending habits.

Adding an additional cardholder is an easy way to share the convenience and accessibility of your CommBank credit card, without opening a new account. You can have one additional cardholder and they must be at least 16 years old. They'll get a card with their name but with your account number.
From 1 December 2023, we will no longer accept new balance transfer requests on our credit cards.

Through AutoPay you can choose to have the full closing balance, minimum amount due or a set amount (assuming it's more than the minimum amount due and less than the full closing balance) directly debited from a CommBank transaction account.
See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank or on the go in the CommBank app.

Extends the manufacturer's Australian warranty on most purchases by up to a year. This is provided the purchase is charged to the cardholder's eligible credit card account or is purchased by redeeming Commonwealth Awards points. Restrictions, exclusions, limits, sub-limits and excesses may apply. Refer to the Credit Card Insurances Information Booklet for full details.

Cover provided for the difference in price of a purchase if the same business item or personal good is advertised for a lower price in store within 21 days of purchase, within 25 kilometres of the store it was purchased. Provided the price difference is greater than $75, we will refund the price difference up to a maximum amount of $500 for any one item, set or pair items (including attached and unattached accessories). This is subject to conditions, exclusions, limits, sub-limits and terms. Refer to the Credit Card Insurances Product Disclosure Statement and Information Booklet for full details.

Covers the repair or replacement cost of goods that are lost, stolen or damaged within 90 days of most purchases. When those items are charged to the cardholder's eligible credit card account or purchased by redeeming Commonwealth Awards points. Restrictions, exclusions, limits, sub-limits and excesses may apply. Refer to the Credit Card Insurances Information Booklet for full details.
Instantly lock, block or limit your credit card for extra control through the CommBank app or NetBank.
Earn bonus points for every dollar you spend on your Awards credit cards when you shop with our bonus partners. The best part is there's no cap on how many bonus points you can earn.
CommBank offers the largest rewards program of any bank in Australia based on number of cardholders. Source: DBM Consultants, customers 18+ with a rewards/loyalty card in the 12 months to March 2023.

Earn 1 Awards point for every $1 spent using your Mastercard, up to and including $2,000 in a statement period. After spending $2,000, the Awards point earn rate is 0.5 Awards points per $1 spent. Earn Bonus Points when you make purchases with your credit card at one of our bonus partners including the Bonus Points eShop. Bonus points do not expire and there is no cap on how many bonus points you can earn each year. The earning and redemption of CommBank Awards points are subject to the Commonwealth (CommBank) Awards Program Terms & Conditions.
A program available exclusively to Mastercard cardholders that provides access to unforgettable experiences in the cities where you live and travel.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Pay with your Apple(TM) device using Apple Pay.
Pay with your Android(TM) phone using the CommBank app.
Pay with your Fitbit(TM) smartwatch using Fitbit Pay.
Pay with your Garmin(TM) smartwatch using Garmin Pay.
Pay with your Android(TM) device using Google Pay(TM).
Pay with your Samsung(TM) device using Samsung Pay.
We help you stay on track with your credit card spending in the CommBank app.
Up to 55 days. We won't charge any interest on purchases if you pay at least the closing balance shown on your statement by the due date each and every month.
Free protection against fraud and other unauthorised transactions with Mastercard Zero Liability.
We'll tell you when your online bill payment is due.
Sends message to customer to inform them their card is over limit and to make payment to reduce limit and prevent an over limit fee from being charged to the account.
Reminders before payments are due to avoid late fees.
Turn Transaction Notifications on in the CommBank app and we'll instantly alert you when you pay using your CommBank credit card, and when you receive money into your everyday account.
Setting a Spending Cap helps you keep on top of your spend. Plus you can still access additional funds if you need them.

Pay off eligible purchases or credit card balances in fixed monthly instalments. A set-up fee of 2%-5% of the purchase amount may apply on purchase plans depending on the term. Otherwise interest is charged on the plan amount.

constraints.additionalInfo: Note that the credit limit we give you will depend on your ability to meet your repayments.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The additional cardholder may be 16 years of age or older.
Available to citizens or permanent resident of Australia and valid Visa holders. Make sure you are legally allowed to work in Australia.
Available to citizens or permanent resident of NZ and valid Visa holders. Make sure you are legally allowed to work in Australia.
Applications for credit cards are subject to credit approval.
Each application for credit is assessed on the ability of the applicant to service debt (limit) based on the financials supplied in the application.

fees.name: Additional cardholder fee
fees.additionalInfo: Pay no additional cardholder fee to share the convenience of your card with someone else.

fees.name: Late payment fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you don't make your minimum monthly payment, plus any overdue amount, by your statement due date.

fees.name: Emergency issue/ lost/ replacement card fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you need an emergency replacement card delivered to you.

fees.name: Qantas Frequent Flyer Direct fee
fees.additionalInfo: There is a $60 annual fee charged for opting in. Once a customer has opted in to Qantas Frequent Flyer Direct, all CommBank Awards points earned after opting in will be automatically redeemed for Qantas Points and transferred monthly to their Qantas Frequent Flyer account at the applicable conversion rate. This fee only applies to customers who have opted in to earn Qantas Points prior to 25th August 2023.

fees.name: International transaction fee (Mastercard and Visa transactions)
fees.additionalInfo: When you make a transaction that is converted by Mastercard or Visa from a foreign currency to Australian dollars.

fees.name: Cash advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: This is charged for cash advances from Commbank branches or other Australian financial institutions, ATMs, overseas terminals or financial institutions, funds transfers using CommBank networks and purchases of cash equivalent items, such as gambling, lottery tickets and money transfers. Capped at a maximum fee of $300.00 (or $4.00 if your closing balance was in credit the previous business day).

fees.name: Cash advance fee
fees.additionalInfo: This is charged for cash advances from Commbank branches or other Australian financial institutions, ATMs, overseas terminals or financial institutions, funds transfers using CommBank networks and purchases of cash equivalent items, such as gambling, lottery tickets and money transfers. Capped at a maximum fee of $300.00 (or $4.00 if your closing balance was in credit the previous business day).

fees.name: International transaction fee (Mastercard and Visa transactions)
fees.additionalInfo: International transaction fee (Transactions in Australian dollars but with an overseas connection).

data.name: Awards credit card
data.description: For customers who want a lower monthly fee and credit limit, but still like to earn Awards points.
